recipesJson.name: Blue Raz: Recipes Made Simple
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
A attempt at blue raspberry flavor. Built by using a few flavors while trying to mimic that fruity tartness you get from a blue raspberry candy.  Enjoy

Recipe notes here====> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_UtvhQxi4hw&t=70s

New mixers always welcome====>https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmcdiy/
